Welcome to NeXDaTaS’s documentation!¶

This project contains the following repositories:

  • Nexus Data Writer implemented as a Tango server
  • Configuration Tool written in PyQt , NXS Component Designer
  • Configuration Server implemented as a Tango server on a MySQL database
  • Nexus Command-line tools provides fast access to Configuration Server and Data Writer from command-line interface
  • Simple examples of configuration files and control clients

To install Debian packages ...

Authors: Jan Kotański, Eugen Wintersberger, Halil Pasic, Maria-Teresa Núñez-Pardo-de-Vera
